boardgame.name: Dos Rios
boardgame.description: Players move their workers around the board (which is composed of variable groups of hexes) building houses along the banks of two rivers. Each turn certain hexes along the river pay out, either in money (which you use to build houses) or lumber (used to make dams). The first player to construct all five of their buildings (four houses and one hacienda) or a hacienda and three houses that are all on a riverbank, wins. Players build dams to change the flow of the rivers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Played twice, condition is still new, all parts are present. This is the english edition. My price is $25 for the game and $10 for USPS priority mail shipping within the continental united states. I accept paypal or a personal check, but I will only ship once the payment has been cleared. I will be on a trip the first two weeks of september, so if you buy this during that period I will contact you when I return.

never played +++++ german manual, but the game parts are alomost completely language independet and you can find an english translation here on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-currency countries in europe : paypal, cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no cheques ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), please ask for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Excellent condition. Minor shelf wear on box, everything included. Money back if not satisfactory for game play.

Mayfair Games (MFG3303) Two mighty rivers wind their way down from the mountains. The fields through which they flow are fruitful, bringing wealth to their owners. Harvest fields with campesinos, gathering riches to build homes and create a prosperous estate. The rivers are the life blood of the land. With skillful placement of dams, you can alter the course of the rivers and bring prosperity to your land. That which was dry will now produce, that which was productive may now be barren. The one who best controls the rivers will control the valley, for the flow of the river carries fortune_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tide.
